name: Living Libraries - open studio events at Cubbon Park
description:
Dive into a vibrant blend of art, nature, and community. Wander through a mini art exhibit, watch inspiring films, join hands-on workshops, and immerse in participatory installations. Create posters for sustainability, craft origami butterflies, and crochet with the Cubbon Crochet Circle. Journal the park’s beauty, uncover the truths of the ivory trade through film, and explore humanoid art reflecting our bond with wildlife. 
Pause, ponder, and rediscover the world with us. Living Libraries awaits your story! 📚🍃 Register for these upcoming open studio events on 27th July at the Cubbon Park Metro station! 
Registration link 
The Living Library initiative by Art in Transit seeks to cultivate a community-driven and participatory vision of the park’s diverse ecological tapestry as an immersive library at the Cubbon Park Metro station.
